text: Chaetopappa bellidifolia , called the Edwards lazy daisy, or whiteray leastdaisy, is a North American species of plants in the sunflower family. It has been found only in central Texas, largely in the Edwards Plateau.Biota of North America Program 2014 distribution mapFlora of North America, Edwards lazy daisy, Chaetopappa bellidifolia (A.
